name: AddThis
short_description:
AddThis provides social engagement tools, APIs and services personalizing
websites for engagement, monetization and traffic boosting.
long_description:
AddThis provide online marketers easy-to-use tools to deliver personalized
experiences to users across the web. Over 15 million domains reaching 2B unique
users, leverage the AddThis platform to drive traffic and engagement. The
company leverages a footprint of 1 trillion page views yearly to power their
unique offering.
